mapper.select: select g.goods_id as spu_id, g.goods_name as spu_name, gi.goods_info_id as sku_id, gi.goods_info_name as sku_name, ifnull(null, gi.sales_num) as sales_num, gi.fix_price from goods g left join goods_info gi on g.goods_id = gi.goods_id where g.del_flag = 0 and gi.del_flag = 0

select g.goods_id , g.goods_name , gi.goods_info_id, gi.goods_info_name, ifnull(null, gi.sales_num), gi.fix_price from goods g left join goods_info gi on g.goods_id = gi.goods_id
g.del_flag = 0 and gi.del_flag = 0
and g.goods_name like concat('%',#{spuName},'%')
and gi.goods_info_name like concat('%',#{skuName},'%')
limit #{limitIndex}, #{limitSize};

select g.goods_id, g.goods_name, gi.goods_info_id, gi.goods_info_name, ifnull(null, gi.sales_num) as sales_num, gi.fix_price from goods g left join goods_info gi on g.goods_id = gi.goods_id where gi.goods_info_id = #{skuId} and g.goods_id = #{spuId}

select count(1) from goods g left join goods_info gi on g.goods_id = gi.goods_id
g.del_flag = 0 and gi.del_flag = 0
and g.goods_name like concat('%',#{spuName},'%') or gi.goods_info_name like concat('%',#{skuName},'%')
